original_text: Wherefore? Because they sought it not by faith, but as it were by the works of the law. For they stumbled at that stumblingstone;
korean_text: 어찌 그러하냐 이는 그들이 믿음을 의지하지 않고 행위를 의지함이라 부딪칠 돌에 부딪쳤느니라

sentences.original_text: Because they sought it not by faith,
but as it were by works of law.
For they stumbled at that stumblingstone;
